import React from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { PencilSquare, Trash } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import '../style/ManageProduct.css' import { product } from '../data/product'; const ManageProduct = () => { return (

Manage Product

{product.map((item, idx) => (
{`id: ${item.id || idx}`}
{item.code} {item.title} ))}
) } export default ManageProduct;
